Detection Preprocessing¶

This module contains tools for the pre-processing otf the hyperspectral data before the detection tests.

author:Jean-Baptiste Courbot - jean-baptiste.courbot@univ-lyon1.fr
date:november 23, 2015
detection_preprocessing.Moffat(dim, FWHM, beta)[source]¶

Moffat function windowed in a square. :param int dim: Square size :param float FWHM: Full Width at Half Maximum of the function :param float beta: Parameter of the Moffat function.

Returns:Moff (ndarray) - Moffat function values.
detection_preprocessing.gen_dic(W, pas=0.25, nb_ech=10, asym=0, P=1)[source]¶

Spectral Gaussian line dictionnary generation with eventual assymettry.

Parameters:
  • W (int) – Number of spectral band.
  • pas (float) – Location step for the lines.
  • nb_ech (int) – Number of lines positions.
  • asym (bool) – Option to set the lines asymetry.
Returns:

D (ndarray) - Normalized dictionnary.
detection_preprocessing.replique_3d_pose(cube, F, D, P=1, interlace=False)[source]¶

Replication of an hyperspectral cube and dictionnary along a local neighborhood weighed by a given FSF.

Parameters:
  • cube (ndarray) – Hyperspectral cube to transform.
  • F (ndarray) – FSF to be used (e.g., windowed Moffat).
  • D (ndarray) – Dictionnary to replicate with the same process.
